text: An la shi tiandi de guangming. Ta de guangming haobi bi ge zhong de yi zhan mingdeng. Na zhan mingdeng zai yige boli zhao nei, nage boli zhao youru yi ke canlan de mingxing. Na zhan mingdeng shi yong yi ke jixiang de ganlan shu you ranzhe de, ta ji bushi dongfang de [ru zaochen de riguang], ye bushi xifang de [ru xiawu de riguang]. Ta de you jishi bu yu huo jiechu, yeshi faguang de, guang shang tian guang. An la yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zouxiang guangming. An la wei renlei shele xuduo biyu, an la shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
